attributes.action: Overseas Recruitment a problem for future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many large companies are taking british jobs abroad and we are likely to have similar situation as financial situation as we are facing today.we could have similar situation with employment if not looked into it sooner, so it can be stopped and get all british jobs back to UK to boost  british economy and employment and lot of companies are recruiting illegal immigrants to save cost for their business which is taking british jobs too.
government should look into these issues before its too late like fiancial sector.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
